mapper.select: SELECT CAT_CODE, CAT_PRTCODE, CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY_TBL WHERE CAT_PRTCODE IS NULL

SELECT P.PRO_NUM, P.PRO_NM, P.PRO_PRICE, P.PRO_DISCOUNT, P.PRO_MAIN_IMG, P.PRO_COUNT, NVL(R.REW_CNT, '0') AS REW_CNT, NVL(R.AVG_SCORE,'0') AS AVG_SCORE FROM PRODUCT_TBL P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRO_NUM, COUNT(REW_NUM) AS REW_CNT, AVG(REW_SCORE) AS AVG_SCORE FROM REVIEW_TBL GROUP BY PRO_NUM ) R ON P.PRO_NUM = R.PRO_NUM ORDER BY P.PRO_NUM DESC
